title: Plugin to Skill Coverage Map
description: Maps Claude Code global plugins to the local skills they functionally cover. Used by sync-claude-code.ps1 to skip redundant skill installation.

globalSkillPatterns.description: Patterns for matching global skills installed in ~/.claude/skills/. If a global skill name matches one of these patterns, the corresponding local skill is considered covered.
globalSkillPatterns.note: Global skills are matched by directory name. A global skill with the same name as a local skill fully covers it.
